description:
Reform UK leader Nigel Farage endorsed a conspiracy theory popular among the far-right during a speech at a farmers’ protest on Monday (10 February), DeSmog can reveal Thousands of farmers descended on London to oppose plans to reduce the threshold for paying inheritance tax on land to £1 million, which critics say could force some […]

The post Nigel Farage Spreads Far-Right Conspiracy Theory at Farming Protest appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Nigel Farage Spreads Far-Right Conspiracy Theory at Farming Protest
